name: Brenhaven Town Gate
description: A sturdy stone archway marks the main gate of the town. Two bored-looking guards stand watch, observing the trickle of travelers. A well-worn path leads out into the wilderness.

characters.name: Guard Lars
characters.description: A young guard who seems more interested in a passing butterfly than his duties.

characters.name: Guard Freya
characters.description: An older, stern-faced guard with a scar across her cheek. Her eyes miss nothing.
